reference.title: Dispatcher
reference.shortdesc: The cbstats dispatcher command gets statistics from reader, writer, auxio, and nonio worker threads.

section.title: Description
section.p: This provides the stats from AUX dispatcher and non-IO dispatcher, and from all the reader and writer threads running for the specific bucket. Along with stats, the job logs for each of the dispatchers and worker threads is also made available.
The following stats are available for the workers and dispatchers:

row.entry: The amount of time it tool for the job to run in milliseconds.
Threadsâ€™s current status: running, sleeping, etc.
The activity the thread ran during that time.
The time stamp when the job started.
